Your Ultimate Tab Manager

Bring order to your browsing chaos with Nest, the powerful tab manager that revolutionizes your Chrome experience. Perfect for work, research, or battling digital distractions, Nest empowers you to effortlessly organize, snooze, and restore your tabs.
Key Features:

Intelligent Tab Organization: Effortlessly group and categorize tabs for streamlined workflows and easy access.

Tab Snoozing: Minimize distractions by temporarily hiding tabs and restoring them at the perfect moment.
Seamless Backup & Restore: Never lose a critical tab again with automatic backups and one-click restoration.

Built-in Note-Taking: Capture ideas and information without leaving your current tab. Save your Notes for as long as you need them. Even when the corresponding Tab was closed long ago.

Clutter-Free Interface: Our minimalist design integrates smoothly with Chrome, keeping you focused on what matters.

Whether you're a professional juggling multiple projects, a student deep in research, or simply seeking a tidier browsing experience, Nest is your solution for tab overload.
Transform your browsing habits today:

•	Organize tabs effortlessly
•	Boost productivity
•	Reduce digital clutter
•	Streamline your workflow

Download Nest now and take control of your tabs!
